TieflingGuard5_102.text: All right... I guess being fearless won't help if an arrow comes flying right at me. Here.
TieflingGuard5_102.context: CinematicNodeContext: She hands you some money.NodeContext: sigh before the all right.

TieflingGuard5_118.speaker: Shadowheart
TieflingGuard5_118.text: Very mercenary of you. I wouldn't have done it any differently.
TieflingGuard5_118.context: NodeContext: Pleased/appreciative of the player's decison to wring some money out of Pandima.

TieflingGuard5_83.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_83.text: All right... I guess being fearless won't help if an arrow comes flying right at me. Here.
TieflingGuard5_83.context: CinematicNodeContext: She hands you some money.NodeContext: sigh before the all right.

TieflingGuard5_10.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_10.text: I wish I could, but... I have nothing left.

TieflingGuard5_116.speaker: Wyll
TieflingGuard5_116.text: How generous. Do you charge by the bell, or the spell?

TieflingGuard5_46.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_46.text: I wish I could, but... I have nothing left.

TieflingGuard5_74.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_74.text: I told you - I'll be fine. It'll wear off soon.

TieflingGuard5_136.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_136.text: Sounds like it was quite the dodgy brew.

TieflingGuard5_98.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_98.context: NodeContext: Angry and annoyed at herself.

TieflingGuard5_101.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_101.text: Don't worry. You're not the only one to have trouble standing after too many 'potions'.

TieflingGuard5_97.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_97.text: I'm not drunk. I just can't... stand.
TieflingGuard5_97.context: NodeContext: Annoyed and snapping at the player. Feigning bravado.

TieflingGuard5_89.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_89.text: I wanted an edge against the goblins, and I got it - I'm as strong as a bugbear. And fearless.
TieflingGuard5_89.context: NodeContext: Trying to feign a bit of bravado at her own situation.

TieflingGuard5_112.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_112.text: But the old lady - she warned me of side effects. Should have listened. Now I'm stuck guarding crates.
TieflingGuard5_112.context: NodeContext: Thinks this is her own fault. Doesn't suspect any fou play. Almost rolling her eyes at herself at the end as she tries and fails to feign indifference.

TieflingGuard5_141.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_141.text: She can't come after you. Take her bag and leave.

TieflingGuard5_114.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_114.context: CinematicNodeContext: She tries to stand up, but her legs buckle and she fals down immediately.NodeContext: The player took her bag. She's trying to get it back and then shouts for the guards.

TieflingGuard5_77.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_77.text: I'd wager your 'potion' was a paralysing agent.

TieflingGuard5_144.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_144.text: What? No, the potion worked! I'm strong as a bugbear. And fearless.
TieflingGuard5_144.context: NodeContext: Player has just suggested she may have been poisoned. She is shocked, horrified and doesn't believe it.

TieflingGuard5_29.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_29.text: The old lady warned me that this might happen. That it was a side effect!
TieflingGuard5_29.context: NodeContext: Disbelief. Thinks there is no foul play. Trusts the old woman.

TieflingGuard5_85.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_85.text: No. She's been nothing but kind to me. Why would she...
TieflingGuard5_85.context: NodeContext: Disbelief. The old woman has been one of the few people kind to her (her kind are mistrusted by most humans). Shocked.

TieflingGuard5_43.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_43.text: ...Sorry, I need a moment. I'm not - not feeling the best. But I'm sure it'll pass.
TieflingGuard5_43.context: NodeContext: Doesn't want to believe it. Hurt at the thought.

TieflingGuard5_49.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_49.text: Well, I won't be knocking a potion back any time soon - I can tell you that.
TieflingGuard5_49.context: NodeContext: Feigning bravado at the situation. She's shook.

TieflingGuard5_143.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_143.text: It might've been nightshade, maybe hemlock - poison, basically.

TieflingGuard5_13.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_13.text: Yes, thanks. I know. Should've never taken that bloody potion.
TieflingGuard5_13.context: NodeContext: Player has asked what's wrong. Embarassed but hiding it with annoyance.

TieflingGuard5_132.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_132.text: I'm a cleric. Let me heal you.

TieflingGuard5_31.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_31.text: No need. Should be able to stand soon enough - once this bloody potion wears off.
TieflingGuard5_31.context: NodeContext: Player has offered her healing services. She's embarassed but plays it off as indifferences as she waves away the player's help.

TieflingGuard5_66.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_66.text: You show too much weakness. You'll be left behind.

TieflingGuard5_39.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_39.text: Relax. I'll be up and about once this potion - wait.

TieflingGuard5_104.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_104.text: What in the Nine Hells happened to your face? Are you all right?
TieflingGuard5_104.context: NodeContext: She has come face to face with a race (the player) that she has never seen. She thinks the player is ill or that something horrible happened to them. Slightly horrified but still concerned.

TieflingGuard5_94.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_94.text: You mentioned a potion. What did you drink?

TieflingGuard5_72.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_72.text: Sorry, I didn't mean - I bought it off the old woman in the cave. Sells potions.

TieflingGuard5_80.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_80.text: I just meant - if you're feeling ill, there's an old woman in the cave. Sells potions.
TieflingGuard5_80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures towards the cave.NodeContext: Player has barked that their health is of no concern to her. She tries to massage the situation and sincerely offers advice. Feels awkward and embarassed.

TieflingGuard5_61.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_61.text: They, erm, have some side effects, but they work. I'm as strong as a bugbear.
TieflingGuard5_61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures to her legs. NodeContext: Sincere and a little awkward.

TieflingGuard5_103.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_103.text: She might be able to help with... that.
TieflingGuard5_103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Overal gestures towards the player. NodeContext: Winces slightly as she gestures to the players face. Feels awkward and a little horrified, but isn't actively trying to be insulting.

TieflingGuard5_79.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_79.text: I think you should worry about yourself.

TieflingGuard5_73.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_73.text: I know. Though I can feel it wearing off. Bloody potion.
TieflingGuard5_73.context: NodeContext: Embarassed and annoyed as the player asked her why she's sprawled on the ground. Nearly mutters the words 'bloody potion' to herself in irritation.

TieflingGuard5_25.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_25.text: That's bull. Get the hells out of here - before I call the guards.

TieflingGuard5_142.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_142.text: I'm afraid I can't. I've been placed in charge of this area.

TieflingGuard5_125.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_125.text: But Zevlor said I... Damn it.

TieflingGuard5_35.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_35.text: Figured it was a pity post anyway.

TieflingGuard5_95.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_95.text: Bull. Get the hells out, before I call the guards.

TieflingGuard5_124.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_124.text: Glare - show her the rage burning in your eyes.

TieflingGuard5_17.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_17.text: Hush, girl. Another word and I'll snap your neck.

TieflingGuard5_93.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_93.context: NodeContext: You're absolutely terrified. The player has just threatened to kill you if you speak. You simply nod,

TieflingGuard5_138.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_138.text: She is vulnerable. Helpless. And you are hungry.

TieflingGuard5_44.speaker: Pandirna
TieflingGuard5_44.text: Why are you looking at me like that?

TieflingGuard5_34.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_34.text: Nothing. Do you need a hand?

TieflingGuard5_96.speaker: Player
TieflingGuard5_96.text: Bare your fangs and lunge at her throat.

AD_Refugee1_0.speaker: Eramas
AD_Refugee1_0.text: Is that everything? I think that's everything...

AD_Refugee1_2.speaker: Eramas
AD_Refugee1_2.text: Right, I've got food, water, my dagger...

AD_TieflingGuard10_0.speaker: Lakrissa
AD_TieflingGuard10_0.text: Goblins, gnolls... so many ways to die.
AD_TieflingGuard10_0.context: NodeContext: Morbid jokes about how to die - jovial.

AD_TieflingGuard10_1.speaker: Lakrissa
AD_TieflingGuard10_1.text: The moment we arrive, I'm heading straight to Elfsong Tavern.
AD_TieflingGuard10_1.context: NodeContext: Relief. They might make it. Determination.

VB_Grave_AdventurerLeader_0.speaker: Narrator
VB_Grave_AdventurerLeader_0.text: *Here lies Aradin. He yearned for glory and adventure. And he got it.*
VB_Grave_AdventurerLeader_0.context: NodeContext: Standing over a grave and reading the headstone.

AD_TieflingGuard1_0.speaker: Rikka
AD_TieflingGuard1_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: She's staring at the dead below.NodeContext: Shocked and scared.

AD_TieflingGuard1_1.speaker: Rikka
AD_TieflingGuard1_1.text: Maybe things are finally getting better.
AD_TieflingGuard1_1.context: NodeContext: slightly hopeful, but still a little scared.
